name: PUZZLE (DieRollGames)
description:
PUZZLE is a combo focused, block based puzzle game where you are working together with your crab friend to clean up the beach of all these blocks that turned up outta nowhere!

Made as part of the A Game By Its Cover Jam 2020. Based on a My Famicase Exhibition cartridge design made by Jaime Ugarte.

Keyboard + Mouse
Arrows/WASD - Move Cinch Left or Right.
Space - Swap Blocks Positions.
S/Shift - Speed Up Olly. Controllers 
Left Stick/D-Pad - Move Cinch Left or Right
A/X - Swap Blocks Position
B/Y - Speed Up Olly.
